item.title: Server Status
item.description: Para este reto se proporcionaban credenciales de ssh. hacker@88110e7a3727:~$ ./server_status === Server Status Monitor v1.0 === System diagnostic tool with root privileges Running with elevated privileges (UID: 0, GID: 0) Initializing.
